page.title: 10PONTFADOG C.P. SCHOOL.
page.content: Pontfadog C.P. school was opened in 1908. It is a brick built building, with a wood and rendering facade similar to Tudor architecture.The main building has two classrooms,a foyer, toilets, stockroom and a kitchen.Recently a mobile classroom has been placed on the yard.At present there are 58 children in school and three members of staff.Some of the children in the school are Welsh speaking and receive their education through the medium of the Welsh language.As the school is very near the Shropshire border, some children from that county come to the school (which is in the county of Clwyd)for a Welsh language education. Because of the rural nature of the area over 40 of the children have to come to school by car, taxi,or mini-bus.
